description: Instructions to verify the Nth word of the mnemonic
defaultMessage: Verify that you wrote down your mnemonic correctly. Enter the {whichWordInBold} into the text field below.

description: Highlighted Nth word message to be injected
defaultMessage: {whichWord, selectordinal, one {#st word} two {#nd word} few {#rd word} other {#th word}}

description: Word number to enter into the text field
